meanings.english_definition: To make right; to remove errors or faults from.
examples: Devo correggere gli errori nel mio saggio. (I need to correct the errors in my essay.)
Il software corregge automaticamente gli errori di ortografia. (The software automatically corrects spelling errors.)

meanings.english_definition: To punish or discipline someone in order to correct their behavior.
examples: I genitori devono correggere i loro figli quando si comportano male. (Parents must correct their children when they misbehave.)
La legge corregge i criminali. (The law punishes criminals.)

meanings.english_definition: To adjust or modify something, often to improve its taste, color, or other quality.
examples: Ho corretto il caffè con un po' di latte. (I corrected the coffee with a little milk.)
Bisogna correggere il colore del dipinto. (The color of the painting needs to be adjusted.)

usage_notes: The verb 'correggere' is versatile and can be used in various contexts, from correcting errors to adjusting flavors. Pay attention to the context to understand the intended meaning.
